trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is placed in the overflow <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.

If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the [ToolStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e681f3ab-94ba-4b2b-ac64-1dfad46caa25) to manage this situation.
Specifies that a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is permanently shown in the overflow <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.

Specifies that a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> drifts between the main <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> and the overflow <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> as required if space is not available on the main <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
Specifies that a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is never a candidate for the overflow <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
If the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> cannot fit on the main <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>, it will not be shown.
